column4: Anyone know of any luck getting SLI 9800 GT Video cards to work with ubuntu?

you might need the latest driver from nvidia.. check out the following for the release notes and install instructions. http://www.nvidia.com/object/linux_display_ia32_185.18.14.html  read carefully and don't shortcut it..
oddly enough man ive tried everything
nvidia has a linux forum you might want to paruse..
